forecast.wind: South 5 to 6, occasionally 7, locally 4 in the far south of the area, increasing 6 to gale 8 overnight, veering southwest around dawn with gusts to 50kt, decreasing 5 to 6 during the afternoon and locally 4 in the south of the area.
forecast.sea: Slight to moderate in the south with a low to moderate swell and rather rough in the north, becoming rather rough to rough in the north overnight.
forecast.weather: Rain in the west this evening spreading east overnight, locally heavy at times, clearing to showers mid-morning mostly in the north of the area.
forecast.visibility: Good, becoming moderate to poor at times.
